channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole on Church Street just before entrance to infant school, 3rd January
item.description:
Pothole appeared following a week of heavy snow and ice in Dec 2022. Very deep hole, my new front tyre is completely flat. Not easy to see pothole as lighting poor down this street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Church Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction in deplorable condition, 3rd January
item.description:
The junction is deplorably potholed, and has been for months or even perhaps years. Please DO something about it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 66 Shurdington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath sign has been moved, 3rd January
item.description:
Within the last couple of weeks, someone has moved the footpath direction sign to the position shown. This indicates the footpath crosses the field directly ahead through the gap. This actually leads nowhere, except into this field. The public footpath actually passes through the gap to the left of this. It is obvious this has been changed recently as the nails in the sign are new and the mark where it was taken from the correct location on a post is obvious. I have used this footpath for over 20 years and it has never crossed the field where the arrow is now pointing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Trails End Stantons Drive, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping, 3rd January
item.description:
Fly Tipping in Quat Goose Lane as shown in photograph

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Home Farm Quat Goose Lane, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chronic flooding, 3rd January
item.description:
Every time there is significant rain, the roadway floods over a considerable area. It becomes very difficult for pedestrians to cross without wading through inches of water. Worse, it becomes impossible to pass by on the footpath without risk of a soaking from careless motorists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 College Lawn, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lifting banging manhole cover, 3rd January
item.description:
This man hole ccver has been lifting and banging since Taylor wimpey completed the road. Was reported to them they said they had fixed it but has not been.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Vale Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole, 2nd January
item.description:
Theres at least 1 pot hole and I believe its near the crossing point thats just before the entrance/exit for Laithwaites.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7100 Hurricane Road, Brockworth

item.title: Two Potholes, 2nd January
item.description:
Two potholes one a few inches deep and another a few meter further down the hill. On the left edge of the road if heading up the hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 31 Greenway Lane, Ullenwood

item.title: Poo bin needs emptying, 2nd January
item.description:
This is by Moorend Road and needs emptying, please. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Brook House Moorend Road, Charlton Park

item.title: Discarded road signs, 2nd January
item.description:
There are three discarded road sign frames on the grass verge on the south side of the A40 between Whittington Road and Arle Court Roundabout. I have added photos of two - one is near the base of the permanent road sign and the other two are further west.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chain-link fence down, causing a trip hazard on the pavement, 2nd January
item.description:
Can somebody take a look and decide what to do about it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 90 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping M5 Southbound slip Jcn 11A, 1st January
item.description:
Several black sacks fly tipped on the slip road Area was cleared by volunteers last year and could do with a tidy up too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Brockworth Roundabout, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Culvert, 1st January
item.description:
A support slab on the culvert between the railings has become detached and a small dog or child could slip into the brook below. It is situated on the green in Benhall Park as indicated on map
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Bibury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous pothole, 1st January
item.description:
There is a deep and dangerous pothole which could damage a vehicle's wheel. It is situated on Robert Burn's Avenue, Benhall, Cheltenham just over the bridge on the right hand side next to a BT telecoms box

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars destroying council grass verge and turning it into mud, 1st January
item.description:
The residents of Old Gloucester Road are seemingly not willing to park on-road at the back on Kingfisher Drive and instead are parking on the grass verge on the main road. The grass has now turned to slush/mud and has sustained damage. It is also a safety issue if a child/pet runs out from parked cars into a 40Mph main road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Old Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole on Old Bath Road, 1st January
item.description:
Pot hole on the carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Verney Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near junctions of bryerland and pillcroft rd, 1st January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Bryerland Road, Witcombe

item.title: Hedge overflowing on to pavement, 31st December
item.description:
The hedge along the first section of Jersey Avenue is overflowing blocking the pavement. It requires cutting back
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 122 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole forming, 31st December
item.description:
Pothole forming that fills with water in the rain, cars splash customers of the village cakery who are sat on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Brookfield Road, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet
